text: The 1934 Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament took place from March 1–3, 1934 at Thompson Gym in Raleigh, North Carolina. The Washington & Lee Generals won their first Southern Conference title, led by head coach Harry "Cy" Young.Southern Conference Tournament Results. p. 8. Retrieved October 31, 2014. ==Format== The top eight finishers of the conference's ten members were eligible for the tournament. Teams were seeded based on conference winning percentage. The tournament used a preset bracket consisting of three rounds. ==Bracket== * Overtime game ==See also== *List of Southern Conference men's basketball champions ==References== Category:1933–34 Southern Conference men's basketball season Category:Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1934 Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
